description: During a late-night ride on the train, Rafael Alencar meets an incognito Ben Andrews, and with no one around, the two horny boys whip out their cocks to give each other rail head, only stopping to make sure they arent discovered cruising as the train stops. Throwing caution to the wind, Alencar rips off his and coat and shirt while he goes to town on Andrews beyond-thick cock. Alencar shoots his load onto the subway seat, while Andrew unloads onto the subway pole.
title: Ben Andrews and Rafael Alencar
